mapper.insert: insert into orderInfo (orderId , userId , proCode ,proPrice , orderStock , address , orderPrice ,orderProName ,deliveryInfo , replyEnum) values (#{orderId},#{userId},#{proCode},#{proPrice},#{orderStock},#{address},#{orderPrice}, #{orderProName} ,#{deliveryInfo} ,#{replyEnum})
mapper.select: select orderId , user.userId , product.proCode , orderStock , orderInfo.proPrice from portfolio.orderInfo LEFT JOIN portfolio.user ON user.userId = orderinfo.userId LEFT JOIN portfolio.product ON product.proCode = orderInfo.proCode where user.userId = #{userId};
